Articles.Content:
Hello guys,

I'm playing with the 1.0.0.830 version.

I tried to install and use some mods, like mechjeb, so I place the folder in the gamedata directory (with module manager 2.6.3), ans then, in KSP, when I build a rocket, I have the component, but when I place it, I cannot use it, and I have any interaction with...

It's the same for anothers mods, I can place a telescope on my rocket, but in space any interaction is possible, no right clicks, etc...

Help me, It's hard to go to Duna with out MechJeb....

Ah! And I downloaded the mods from http://www.curse.com/ksp-mods/kerbal?filter-project-game-version=1.0.0&filter-project-sort=1 , with the 1.0.0 version filter !

Thanks !
